description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Shuffle a Heimerdinger into your deck.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
